description:
Framework for interacting with prompt-based LLMs (Large Language Models such as, but not
limited to, ChatGPT) in order to develop domain specific taxonomies. The software itself is a series of prompts designed to
extract hierarchical taxonomy categories from an LLM, as well as guidelines for how to fine-tune LLMs in order to provide
better domain-specific taxonomic categories.
name: Prompt-Based Development of Domain-Specific Taxonomies

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
